payload: You Make The Hire. We Make It Simple. Modern recruiting communication with chatbots, AI, and text message automation for faster hiring

name: To display Information about Phase 1
func:
msg.payload="Phase 1 of this project deals with the general way of recruitment.Here, the Company should set its requirements initially.when a candidate submits his details, our model compares with the requirements and takes an action based on it."
return msg;

name: To display Information about Phase 2
func:
msg.payload="Phase 2 of the solution deals with AI-enabled way of recruitment. Here, our model trains based on the previously worked employes data.The software learns about existing employeesâ€™ experience, education, and other qualifications and applies this knowledge to new applicants in order to predict the selection possibility for the shortlisting candidates list."
return msg;

name: To display Information about Phase 3
func:
msg.payload="Phase 3 of our project works based on the Work & Prove method. Here, the job posting company should post a piece of work,When the candidate is interacting with our chatbot, then it displays the problem to the candidate. "
return msg;

Candidate_Data
func:
var date = new Date();
var timestamp = date.getTime();
var str=""

flow.set("cidcan",msg.payload)
str=""+timestamp
flow.set("apid",str)
 msg.payload={
      MAILID:"",
      NAME:"",
      MBLNO:0,
      SKILLS:"",
      DEGREE:flow.get("education"),
      EXP:"",
      INTERN:flow.get("internshipcount"),
      DESC:"",
      CODE:"",
      CID:msg.payload,
      P1:"",
      P2:"",
      P3:"",
      MSG:"",
      APID:str,
      RESUMELINK:flow.get("rlink"),
      VISITED:"notvisited",
      PERCENTAGE:flow.get("percentage"),
      BEHAVIOURAL:flow.get("behavioural"),
      COMMON:flow.get("common"),
      SITUATIONAL:flow.get("situational")
    }
return msg;
